page.title: 03Northwood Church.
page.content: Northwood Parish Church or The Church of St. John The Baptist is just off Cowes Road.The vicar is Richard Parker and he gives interesting sermons. People have been worshipping here since the 12th. century when the church was built.When you enter the church you pass through the original norman arch. There is also an old font and the pulpit is over three hundred years old.Today an average of eighty people worship in the church each Sunday. There are often special services for children and their parents. There is a family service every month and Morning Prayer or Holy communion on Sundays.On Mothering Sunday all the mothers get a posy of flowers.At Christmas the children of Northwood School sing carols in church.
